snippet.title: Cut The Buttons
snippet.description:
Download it on Google Play Store : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.draft.lineamania


Cut The Buttons is a free puzzle game in which you have to switch the position of a colored button to line it with at least two others in a shaft. Once every buttons have been cut, the puzzle is complete.

Switch the buttons sewn positions on the scrap of denim to align them and cut them with the scissors.


Description

Cut The Buttons is a great lines game to play when you're bored. In addition to improving your logic skills, training your brain and entertaining yourself, it helps you to spend some time in a relaxing manner. Playing this game will keep your brain awake and you will have a great satisfaction while solving more and more levels.
Cut The Buttons is a fun puzzle lines game where you have to align 3+ buttons (on a denim) in a shaft to cut them. Train your brain and challenge yourself. Move a button in any direction (horizontal, vertical or diagonal) to align it with at least two others. A button cannot be moved above an other. Since at least three buttons are aligned, they are cut by the scissors. When each button disappeared, you win. Do not hurry ! Starting with the wrong assembly can prevent you from gaining the level. If you're stuck, just tap the replay button. Play Cut The Buttons to improve your logic skills.
Two levels of difficulty exist : Play as beginner to appease yourself. Play as master to train it.


How to play?

- On the denim, switch a colored button position in any direction to align it with two (or more) in a shaft of the same color!
- Match at least three buttons in any direction: lines, columns or diagonals
- A button can not be moved above another 
- When at least three buttons are aligned, they are automatically cut by the scissors !
- Clear the puzzle to complete the level!


Features

- Earn up to 100,000 points of XP for your Google Play Account
- Match colored buttons in lines to make them explode!
- Train your brain with over 50 challenging levels! (And more to come)
- Place the button at the right place to blow up one row and one column at the same time
- No timer! Appease yourself and have fun!
- Find the right combination!
- Easily accessible "retry" button!
- Challenging puzzles to improve your logic!
- A shaft to indicates where the button comes from
- Beautiful graphics and realistic denim
- Suitable for phones and tablets
- Save and restore your progress
- Stunning animations
- A very sharp scissors
- 400+ levels
